Animations

These are SCSS mixins made to speed up your development process to animate elements.

File to include

@include "animations";

How to use them

Name
Effect
Example
Code

width-grow-n

Goes from 0 to a given number (n) in the parent width. Exists from 5 to 100, with an increment of 5.

@include animation(width-grow-5 .25s 1);

spin

Make an object spin.

@include animation(spin 2s linear infinite);

circle-chart-fill

Animate the circular chart. Exists from 5 to 100, with an increment of 5.

@include animation(circle-chart-fill 3s reverse);

V1.0
